mapper.insert: insert into ms_bank_account (id, mem_id, account_idcard, account_no, account_name, account_bank, account_province, account_city, account_area, account_sub_bank, is_default, remark, create_date, update_date ) values( #{id}, #{memId}, #{accountIdcard}, #{accountNo}, #{accountName}, #{accountBank}, #{accountProvince}, #{accountCity}, #{accountArea}, #{accountSubBank}, #{isDefault}, #{remark}, now(), now() )
mapper.select: select id as id, mem_id as memId, account_idcard as accountIdcard, account_no as accountNo, account_name as accountName, account_bank as accountBank, account_province as accountProvince, account_city as accountCity, account_area as accountArea, account_sub_bank as accountSubBank, is_default as isDefault, remark as remark, create_date as createDate, update_date as updateDate from ms_bank_account where mem_id = #{memId} and account_no = #{accountNo}

select id as id, bank_id as bankId, bank_short as bankShort, bank_english_name as bankEnglishName, bank_chine_name as bankChineName, bank_phone as bankPhone, bank_net as bankNet, data_status as dataStatus, bank_sort as bankSort, remark as remark from ms_bank_info where data_status = '1' order by bank_sort desc
